briefTitle: APT™ T3X on the COVID-19 Contamination Rate
officialTitle: Use of APT™ T3X to Decrease the COVID-19 Contamination Rate in Humans

protocolDocument.label: Study Protocol and Statistical Analysis Plan

primary.description: Rate of how many people were infected with COVID-19 over the course of the study in each group.

secondary.measure: Number of Participants With Adverse Events
secondary.description: Number of participants who presented adverse events.
Average number of adverse events over the course of the study.

secondary.measure: Days Over Which an Adverse Event Was Reported
secondary.description: Average days over which an adverse event was reported.

secondary.measure: Other Virus or Bacteria Contamination Rate.
secondary.description: Rate of how many people were infected with influenza or pneumonia over the course of the study in each group.
